sections.heading: Creation of Office of Regulatory Reinvention in Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Administrative Rules Manager to Chief Regulatory Officer; Review of Existing and Proposed Rules and Rule Making Processes; Oversight of Non-Rule Regulatory Actions
